news.headline: Alphabet Shares Take $138 Billion Blow as Search Warnings Blare
news.summary: (Bloomberg) -- For more than a year, Alphabet Inc. shareholders have fretted over long-term risks posed by artificial intelligence to the company’s money-printing search business. news.headline: Apple Building Specialized Chips for Smart Glasses
news.summary: Apple is developing new chips for future devices, including smart glasses and artificial intelligence servers. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman discusses Apple's plans with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Technology."

news.headline: Sonos Interim CEO Says Company Has Turned a Corner and He Wants the Top Job
news.summary: (Bloomberg) -- Sonos Inc. interim Chief Executive Officer Tom Conrad said the audio company has “turned the corner” following setbacks caused by software issues — and that he wants to be named to the top job permanently.
